descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=5]Aoi Standalone Follower[/size][size=2]
[/size]
[/font][b][font=Georgia][color=#ff0000][size=4]English and Japanese descripiton[/size][/color][/font][/b]


[color=#e06666][size=4]Tell me if you find some problems.[/size][/color]
I'm not bad English and good at Japanese.

問題その他何かあればご連絡下さい。

[font=Arial][color=#ead1dc][size=4][Introduction][/size][/color][/font]
I've heard that a certain girl wanders in Ivarstead recently. Has she moved there? I don't know. She has a turquoise hair, strange eyes and a face tattoo. That is all I know. I think you can see her if you visit there. 

最近、ある女性がイヴァルステッドをうろついているようです。引っ越してきたかどうかはよく分かりません...。私が知っているのは、空色の髪で、目と顔のタトゥーが印象的だということだけです。行けば会えるんですから、行かないに越した事はないでしょう。


[color=#ead1dc][size=4][What's This Mod?][/size][/color]
This mod Adds STANDALONE FOLLOWERS Aoi, to Ivarstead. (She lives in a woman convert that this mod also adds)

フォロワーのAoiをイヴァルステッドに追加します。(彼女が住む隠れ家も追加されます)


[color=#ead1dc][size=4][About Them][/size][/color]
She is good at magics of Restoration and one-handed sword.

彼女は回復呪文と片手武器をメインとした戦闘スタイルで戦います。[b][color=#ffe599]
[/color]
[/b][color=#ff00ff][size=6]Bodytype:UNPB-BBP[/size][/color]
[color=#444444][size=1]おっぱいぷるんぷるん　Σ(ﾟДﾟ；)ｪｪ！？[/size][/color]

[color=#ead1dc][size=4][Recommended Mods][/size][/color]
Any of Follower overhaul mods like FLP(I use FLP)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303/?]Female Facial Animation[/url] by nao4288
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url] by tktk

[color=#ead1dc][size=4][Credits][/size][/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951/?][b]Enhanced Character Edit[/b][/url] by tktk 
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59192/?]Eyes of Aber[/url][/b] by [b]Aberin[/b]
[size=2][b][url=http://shockyy.tumblr.com/post/106418391954/ks-hairdos-400-the-hairpack-has-been-updated-with]KS Hairdos[/url] by Daniel[/b][/size][size=2][b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url] by dimon99 [size=2]
[/size][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNP BLESSED BODY- UNPB REDUX PROJECT[/url] by [b]Blessed Redux Project team[/b]
[/size]
Thanks to anyone I forgot to mention here.[/b]
 
[/size]I'm looking foward to your uploading [b]screen[/b] [b]shots[/b] that they are in them.
ＳＳ大募集！
author: zahaku
